title: Luca Y. Kogelheide
text: Hi! I am Luca. Currently, I am a master’s student at Utrecht University, doing the Methodology and Statistics master’s degree. I am following the European Master of Official Statistics (EMOS) with Statistics Netherlands. My interests include Data Quality, Survey Methodology and Philosophy of Statistics/Science.
